Class PlayerControllerTest

extends java.lang.Object
    Test Class for PlayerController class
    Author:
    Shiva, Anusha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      PlayerControllerTest()
      StartupPhaseTest Constructor for initial setup

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void isAlloutAttackworks()
      for testing whether the all out attack works properly meaning while in the state of all out attack the attacker attacks until whether his armies has reached 1 or he has taken the attacked country
      void isAttack()
      for testing whether the countries to be in a fight are adjacent or not
      void isAttackPossible()
      for testing whether the countries are for the same player or not for attacking
      void isAttackvalid()
      for testing whether the attacker country have enough armies for attacking or not
      void isFortificationComplete()
      Test method to check whether the fortification is working fine or not
      void isFortificationNotComplete()
      Test method to validate the number of armies present in the fromCountry and the toCountry after the player moves the armies between fromCountry and toCountry which are not adjacent.
      void isReinforcementworking()
      for testing whether the Reinforcement phase works when the continent is owned by one player and it assigns the control value correctly
      void testAllocationArmy()
      Test method to validate the allocation of armies to each player as per the number of players.
      void testallocationOfArmyToCountriesInitially()
      Test case to validate the initial allocation of armies to each country owned by players.
      void testSaveGame()
      this method checks the saving and loading a game
